name: Trail of Tiles
description:
Trail of Tiles

This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

It is a puzzle game that makes use of tiles with different functions and effects to stop you from reaching the finish. Can you find the way? There are 20 levels.

Made by Yukek and Newry Benson in 6 days

Special thanks to Balistari for the background art

Important:

The functions for the 3 buttons in the top left are respectively:

  • Reset current level
  • Info about the different tiles: be sure to use it!
  • Preview camera to look ahead, exit the preview camera by pressing the button again!!
